description:
Rukia`s execution date is advanced to a final time on the following day.  Toshiro wonders if the acquisition of the Sokyoku is actually the intent of Ichimaru.  Renji Abarai joins Yoruichi and Ichigo on the same training ground, with the similar goal of attaining  bankai.  Renji brings with him news of the twenty-nine hour countdown to Rukia`s execution.  In her holding cell, Rukia has a revealing dream that she understands as preparation of her strength and comprehension of the next day`s events.
Source: crunchyroll
